virtual bool iqt2d::CCircleParamsGuiComp::OnAttached ( imod::IModel *  modelPtr  )  [virtual]

This call back function will be called, if an observable object is about to be attached.

This function returns a true, if observable object is accepted by the implementation logic of the observer, otherwise the function returns a false.

Reimplemented from iqtgui::TGuiObserverWrap< TDesignerGuiCompBase< Ui::CCircleParamsGuiComp, QWidget >, imod::TSingleModelObserverBase< i2d::CCircle > >.

virtual void iqt2d::CCircleParamsGuiComp::UpdateEditor ( int  updateFlags = 0  )  [virtual]

Updates editor with model data.

This method will be called only if GUI is connected.

Parameters:
updateFlags the same as changeFlag in istd::IChangeable.

This method will be called only if GUI is connected and model is attached.
